text: Brett Borgen (7 November 1934 - 11 March 2014) was a Norwegian novelist and poet. Her best known works were Fra en ikke helt vellykket skuespillerinnes dagbok (1972), Dualoger med VÃ¥r Herre and Isabella, sorgen og Don Juan (1977), En time med Jesus (1978), Den fortapte datter (1979), Heltinnen (1981). She also wrote the memoir Lillelord og Lady Brett (1985). She was born and died in Oslo. She was 79 years old when she died. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Norwegian novelists Category:Norwegian poets Category:Writers from Oslo
title: Brett Borgen
